About Rexone Studios

Game programming in general is not a trivial task and let alone game programming for small devices. Every day we face challenges that we try to overcome and push the limits of small device hardware to a maximum. Rexone Studios is committed to entertain gamers of smart phones with unique and fun games. Our first endeavor is Ninjaken, which is currently on Google Play and Amazon App Store.
